page.title: 09TOPSHAM SCHOOL POND
page.content: In our science lessons we are finding out about our school pond. It measures 2 metres by 3 metres 30 cm and is becoming rather overgrown. There are irises in the middle and other types of reeds around them. There are lots of plants and creatures in our pond, for example pond skaters, a baby newt and some water boatmen. Around the pond there are beatles. We did have some goldfish but we have not seen them for quite some time now. We do not know if they are alive or not and just hiding in the reeds. In our science lessons we often go to the school pond to find insects and study them, but we always put them back afterwards.
